H0.text: Which famous football figure managed the Ivory Coast national team at the FIFA 2010 World Cup Finals. Guus Hiddink

H1.text: Which famous football figure managed the Ivory Coast national team at the FIFA 2010 World Cup Finals. Claude Le Roy

H2.text: Which famous football figure managed the Ivory Coast national team at the FIFA 2010 World Cup Finals. Philippe Troussier

H3.text: Which famous football figure managed the Ivory Coast national team at the FIFA 2010 World Cup Finals. Svennis

A4.text: Philippe Troussier was assigned to qualify for the 1994 FIFA World Cup with the Ivory Coast national team.
